project.description: This project used to publish mindspore website test for tutorilas_developer branch;

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e
GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) PROJECT_NAME="mindspore-test-website" GITEE_EMAIL="yang_liu0418@163.com"
echo "GIT_PREVIOUS_SUCCESSFUL_COMMIT":${GIT_PREVIOUS_SUCCESSFUL_COMMIT} echo "GIT_COMMIT":${GIT_COMMIT} if [ ${GIT_PREVIOUS_SUCCESSFUL_COMMIT} == ${GIT_COMMIT} ];then echo "Nothing to commit, Working tree clean and exit." exit 0 fi
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u ap-southeast-1@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com else echo "docker not installed." exit fi
################################################################################ # get rasp.tgz/setenv.sh if [ -d "mindspore_rasp_test" ]; then rm -rf "mindspore_rasp_test" fi
git config --global user.email $GITEE_EMAIL git config --global user.name liuyanglinux
git clone https://liuyanglinux:Liu19960418@gitee.com/liuyanglinux/mindspore_rasp_test cp mindspore_rasp_test/java_rasp/rasp.tgz mindspore_rasp_test/java_rasp/setenv.sh $WORKSPACE ################################################################################
cd $WORKSPACE ################################################################################ #sed -i 's|tomcat:9.0.48-jdk8-openjdk-slim|swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/tomcat:9.0.10-20.03-lts-sp1|g' Dockerfile #sed -i '33d' Dockerfile #sed -i '32a\RUN yum update && yum -y install unzip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* && mkdir -p /mnt/share/website' Dockerfile #sed -i 's/local/share/g' Dockerfile #sed -i "s|registry.npmmirror.com|repo.huaweicloud.com/repository/npm|" ./Dockerfile #sed -i "s|registry.npmmirror.com|repo.huaweicloud.com/repository/npm/|" ./Dockerfile #sed -i "s|npm install --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com|npm ci --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org|" ./Dockerfile #sed -i "s|RUN npm install --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com||" ./Dockerfile #sed -i "17i RUN npm config set registry https://repo.huaweicloud.com/repository/npm/" ./Dockerfile #sed -i "18i RUN npm cache clean -f" ./Dockerfile #sed -i "17i RUN npm cache clean --force && npm install -g npm@8.5.5" ./Dockerfile
# sed npm address sed -i "17i RUN npm cache clean --force" ./Dockerfile sed -i "s|RUN npm install --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com|RUN npm i --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com|" ./Dockerfile cat ./Dockerfile
# add to deploy rasp sed -i '36a ADD rasp.tgz \/path\/to\/app_home\/' ./Dockerfile sed -i '37a COPY setenv.sh /usr/local/tomcat/bin/' ./Dockerfile sed -i '38a RUN chown -R root\:root \/path\/to\/app_home\/rasp && chmod 755 -R \/path\/to\/app_home\/rasp' ./Dockerfile sed -i '39a RUN chmod 750 \/usr\/local\/tomcat\/bin\/setenv.sh' ./Dockerfile
docker build -t swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/mindspore-website-test:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/mindspore-website-test:$IMAGE_VERSION
if [ -d "infra-common" ]; then rm -rf "infra-common" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-common cd infra-common/common-applications/test-environment/mindspore-website-test else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/mindspore-website-test:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update mindspore-website-test image to mindspore-website-test:$IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi
ARGOCD_TOKEN=`curl -X POST -s -d '{"password":"'${ARGOCD_PASS}'","username":"'${ARGOCD_USER}'"}' "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/session"|tail -1 |awk -F '[""]' '{print$4}'`>/dev/null curl -X POST -s -o /dev/null --cookie "argocd.token=${ARGOCD_TOKEN}" "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/applications/${PROJECT_NAME}/sync">/dev/null
docker rmi swr.ap-southeast-1.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/mindspore-website-test:$IMAGE_VERSION
